meanings.sent1: The cat was the plumpiest in the litter, with a round belly and chubby cheeks.
meanings.sent2: She chose the plumpiest peach from the basket, knowing it would be the juiciest.
meanings.sent3: The plumpiest squirrel in the park always managed to find the biggest acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her plumpiest teddy bear was so full of stuffing, it felt like hugging a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The plumpiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows floating above.

meanings.definition: Plumpiest: most plump or full in form
meanings.sent1: The plumpiest pumpkin at the fair won first prize for its impressive size.
meanings.sent2: The baker always used the plumpiest blueberries in her muffins for extra sweetness.
meanings.sent3: The plumpiest snowman in the yard melted first under the warm winter sun.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned the plumpiest shade of pink when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The plumpiest pillow on the bed was her favorite to rest her head on at night.

meanings.definition: Plumpiest: having a full, rounded shape
meanings.sent1: The plumpiest baby in the nursery had chubby cheeks and a round belly.
meanings.sent2: The plumpiest grapes on the vine were ready to be picked and enjoyed.
meanings.sent3: The plumpiest balloon at the party popped with a loud bang, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her plumpiest purse was so full of coins, it was difficult to close.
meanings.sent5: The plumpiest clouds in the sky cast shadows over the green fields below.
